name: Joseph
text: We will soon arrive at the waste-sorting factory.

name: Joseph
text: We need to hurry up and find a way to get into building.

name: Joseph
text: But why there is no guard or any securitiy around here?

name: Student
text: Mr. Joseph, I think I heard something coming from that door.

name: Student
text: Er... Mr., I don't think hamburger is not this big.

name: Joseph
text: We need to get rid of this monster.

name: Joseph
text: Stay by my back and find a chance to attack okay?
